name: About
title: Publication Storage System
description: This is a demo project showing what a storage system for scientific publications may look like.

paragraphs.title: Timeline
paragraphs.text: Here you can see all the recently added publications in their chronological order.

paragraphs.title: Authors
paragraphs.text: Here you can find the information about the authors and also download a list of all the publications for a specific author in the .docx format.
